text: absentee voting procedures amend rsa to read as follows provisions for general election upon receipt of a properly executed application for an official absentee ballot for a general election whether the form supplied by the secretary of state the federal official post card form or a written statement containing the information required by rsa i a town or city clerk shall forthwith ascertain if the applicant is on the checklist of the town or city if the applicant is on the checklist the clerk shall send the materials provided for in rsa to the applicant and record the information pursuant to rsa if not the clerk shall refuse to certify as provided in rsa an application may be transmitted by facsimile to a town or city clerk under no circumstances shall a town or city clerk mail an absentee ballot to any person unless and until such person has submitted an absentee ballot application and the town or city clerk has approved such application
